title: BUG: sleeping function called from invalid context in lock_sock_nested (2)

fix-commits.title: Bluetooth: defer cleanup of resources in hci_unregister_dev()
Bluetooth: defer cleanup of resources in hci_unregister_dev()

cause-commit.title: device-tree: bindinds: add NXP PCT2075 as compatible device to LM75
